intro: Ceratostema grandiflorum, commonly known as the large-flowered horned bean, is a flowering plant native to China. The plant produces small, fragrant white or pale yellow flowers that bloom in late spring to early summer. Its foliage consists of opposite, ovate leaves with a slightly hairy texture. Ceratostema grandiflorum is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its unique appearance and ability to thrive in well-drained soil.
